Command.Name: Resource_GetOneByTransactionNumber
Command.CommandText: select transactionNumber as `Index`, Keyword as `Key`, chinese as Chinese, english as English from multipleresource where transactionnumber = @Index

Command.Name: Resource_GetOneByKey
Command.CommandText: select transactionNumber as `Index`, Keyword as `Key`, chinese as Chinese, english as English from multipleresource where Keyword = @Key

Command.Name: Resource_NewOne
Resource_UpdateOne
Command.CommandText: update multipleresource set chinese = @Chinese, english = @English where transactionnumber = @Index

Command.Name: Resource_Search
Command.CommandText: select transactionNumber as `Index`, Keyword as `Key`, chinese as Chinese, english as English from multipleresource where (@KeyWordType = 'Key' and Keyword like concat('%',@Content,'%')) or (@KeyWordType = 'Value' and (chinese like concat('%',@Content,'%') or english like concat('%',@Content,'%'))) order by transactionnumber desc Limit @Total
